meanings.definition: In a manner lacking melody or harmony
meanings.sent1: She sang tunelessly during the school play.
meanings.sent2: The bird chirped tunelessly outside my window.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed tunelessly as if trying to mimic a song.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled tunelessly through the empty streets.
meanings.sent5: The old radio crackled tunelessly, unable to find a clear station.

meanings.sent1: His tuneless guitar playing annoyed the neighbors.
meanings.sent2: The tuneless drumming echoed through the room.
meanings.sent3: The tuneless dance moves made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The tuneless hum of the machine filled the factory.
meanings.sent5: The tuneless singing of the children was endearing in its own way.
